channel.title: Projects on Z!!V | Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Z!!V | Data Science Portfolio

item.title: HR Analytics
item.description: Objective: Identifying, classifying and quantifying the productivity of emplopyees. Calculate ROI of emplopyee initiatives Helps in supporting the business decisions with the backing of data.

item.title: Computer Vision Projects
item.description: There are 4 short and cool projects under this one section.

item.title: NLP Projects
item.description: There are 6 short and cool projects under this one section.

item.title: The Startup Quadrant
item.description: Problem statement: A Venture Capital Fund company approaches via Board of Directors who are currently reviewing 1000 potentially interesting startups and deciding on which ones they are going to invest in.

item.title: Forecasting
item.description: There are three sub-projects under this section: Global warming temperature Forecast

item.title: Exploration & Analytics
item.description: The learning projects were based on exploration and running functional programming codes to extract and later analyze on them.

item.description: Project done while learning with the help from codebasics Problem statement:

item.title: SQL Data Exploration
item.description: Project done while learning with the help from Alex The Analyst

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: Perform analysis on the dataset and plot various insights revealing graphs using Tableau, animations have been applied to see how and which countries were affected by the virus.

item.title: IRIS
item.description: Project done while being an internee @ The Sparks Foundation

item.title: Natural Language Processing
item.description: Resume screening The model shows how the resume screening is mostly done by most of the companies by selecting particular words from the individual’s resume.

item.title: Perrin Freres Monthly Champagne Sales
item.description: Build the model based on ARIMA & SARIMA algorithms to forecast monthly sales of Champagne, as due to seasonality captured in the dataset SARIMA performed better.

item.title: Stock Price Prediction
item.description: Build a webapp using dash and deployed on heroku, used python, plotly, lstm model and other important scikit libraries.

item.title: Machine Learning Automation
item.description: Build a webapp using streamit and deployed on stramlit.

item.title: Cryptocurrency EDA
item.description: Build a webapp using streamit and deployed on heroku, used python and other important scikit libraries.

item.title: Flight Price Prediction
item.description: Curated data using firstly with automated analysing and based on that manually cleaned the data.

item.title: Credit Card Lead Generation
item.description: Identifying customers that could show higher intent towards a recommended credit card.

item.title: FDI Inflows
item.description: Perform analysis on the dataset and plot various insights revealing graphs using Tableau, unpivoting data from converting wide format to long format, cleaned labels.

item.title: Bank Customer Baseline
item.description: Perform analysis on the dataset and plot various insights revealing graphs using Tableau.

item.title: Zomato Rating Prediction
item.description: Perform extensive Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) on the Zomato Dataset which will be described as below as you scroll down.

item.title: Web Scrapping
item.description: Purpose of the project was to scrap various sites using various libraries.

item.title: Bank Note Authentication
item.description: Purpose of the project was to predict the whether the bank notes were authenticate or they are fake.

item.title: Air Pollution
item.description: Purpose of the project was to predict the air quality of Bengaluru city based on the data which was scrapped from the multiple sites and later after processing it was converted into a csv file using BeautifulSoup.

item.title: Out Of Office
item.description: The purpose of the project was to predict based on the data whether an employee is going to be absent or not, on their daily work routine.
